issue.title: [Plasma] Methods in plasma/store.h returning PlasmaError should return Status instead
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2887](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2887). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These functions are not able to return other kinds of errors (e.g. CUDA-related errors) as a result of this. I encountered this while working on ARROW-2883
